org.hps.recon.tracking.straight

Class StraightThroughAnalysisDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.straight.StraightThroughAnalysisDriver

  • public class StraightThroughAnalysisDriver
extends Driver
    Driver that fits SiTrackerHitStrip1D clusters to a straight line track model.
